participant_1.background:
I enjoy a great time at the Comic Con with my husband.
i am eighteen years old.
I don't have any pets, but I love dancing in my head.
I am not too concerned with my appearance, but I do like to look my best for my girlfriend.
My family is a family of storytellers, and we are all passionate about sharing our stories with the world.

participant_2.background:
I sometimes play with my guns in a dangerous way.
i prefer headsets over earbuds.
I'm a creative person who loves to make my own clothes and play board games.
I enjoy getting a run in and then drinking some chai tea to relax.
i like playing video games.

content.text: Hey! It's going well. I'm just about to play some video games. How about you?
I'm good! I just got back from Comic Con. It was a lot of fun.
I love Comic Con! I went last year and it was amazing. What was your favorite part?
My favorite part was meeting all the different people and seeing all the amazing costumes.
That sounds awesome! I love meeting new people and seeing creative costumes.
Me too! I'm glad you had a good time at Comic Con.
Thanks! I'm glad you did too.
So, what do you do for fun?
I'm a creative person who loves to make my own clothes and play board games. I also enjoy getting a run in and then drinking some chai tea to relax.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love making my own clothes too. I'm not much of a runner, but I do enjoy board games and chai tea.
It's always nice to meet someone who shares your interests.
Well, I'm going to get going now. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have fun with your video games!
